definition: sea breeze/sea wind (i.e. from the sea)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
lit. raging sea of bureaucracy/officials causing a big fuss

sentences.english: We can enjoy the sea breeze and the soft sand.
sentences.chinese: 我們能吹吹海風，還能踩在軟軟的沙子上。

sentences.english: My island sways in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 我的心島也在海風中使勁搖移。

sentences.english: The gulls went in slanting flight up the wind toward the gray desolate east.
sentences.chinese: 海鷗斜着翅膀迎着海風朝灰暗淒涼的東方飛去。

sentences.english: Description, Wind is whistling, play happily in the beautiful sea.
sentences.chinese: 有海風低吟淺唱，跟海豚一起找尋海底的祕密。

sentences.english: However, a tree on the coast, exposed to a constant wind from the sea, bends away from the blast.
sentences.chinese: 然而，海邊的樹常年受海風吹拂，總朝順風方向彎曲。

sentences.english: Plastic buckets and balls roll around in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 塑料小桶和沙灘球在海風的吹拂下四處滾動。

sentences.english: Sometimes I will alsopick up some sea shells or feel the sea wind.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我也會撿一些海鮮貝殼，或者吹吹海風。

sentences.english: Opening its embrace to the warm sea breezes, the home covers an area of 1397 sqm.
sentences.chinese: 佔地1397平方米的別墅沐浴在溫暖的海風中。

sentences.english: Outside, a warm sea breeze blows, and the sun is shining.
sentences.chinese: 機場外，一陣溫暖的海風吹過，燦爛的陽光照耀大地。

sentences.english: The high tide will erase footprints, and the wind will blow away the foam.
sentences.chinese: 漲潮會抹掉我的足跡，海風會吹去這泡沫。

sentences.english: The houses cling to the hillside as if hung there by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 民居緊緊貼住山坡上，似乎是由海風的力量固定着的。

sentences.english: The white clouds floating in the clear sky and gentle sea breeze make him home-sick.
sentences.chinese: 藍天上漂浮的白雲和輕柔的海風使他想起了家。

sentences.english: A clear morning, with breezes all the way from the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個清爽的早晨，陣陣海風拂過。

sentences.english: A bone wave-whitened and dried in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 一根被海浪洗白被海風吹乾的骨頭。

sentences.english: Are you particulars dispelled by sea breeze?
sentences.chinese: 是一些被海風吹散的細節？

sentences.english: The hightide will erase my footprints, and the wind will blow away thefoam.
sentences.chinese: 漲潮會抹掉我的足跡，海風會吹去這泡沫。

definition: slightly cold/cool/(neologism) (slang) to be done for/about to be obliterated/(of a place or a person) desolate
to turn over/to surge/to churn/to rummage/raging (torrent)
a burst/a fit/a peal/a spell (period of time)
